title: Origin
shortDescription: A serverless origin for your website
longDescription:
Need an origin without all the overhead?  Origin is a serverless homepage without the pesky DNS or server configuration.

If you own *example.com*, Origin will show a home page for requests to *www.example.com/* and a 404 page for unmatched routes.

Origin Features:
* Configureable serverless homepage
* Configureable serverless 404 page

Read Origin's [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/origin.html) for complete information.
author: Network Chimp

products.title: Free
products.longDescription: Customize your own origin and error page

categories.title: Performance
categories.description: Improve the speed or perceived responsiveness of your website.

pageName.description: Name used to identify this page.
pageName.title: Page Name *

pageRoute.description: Page will display on this URL.
pageRoute.title: Page URL *

pageTemplate.description: Template to display on this Page URL.
pageTemplate.title: Page Template *

responseHeaders.description: Headers that will be added to each page request.
responseHeaders.title: Custom Headers

gettingStarted1.helpvalue: ‚ö° Enable Origin Mode to simulate an origin server on your domain.  Requests made to www.yoursite.com will render a home page and requests to nonexistant pages will render a 404 page.

gettingStarted10.helpvalue: üìñ Read the docs for more information.

gettingStarted12.helpvalue: ‚ö° Note that Origin Mode will disable any other Cloudflare Workers that are running on your origin.

gettingStarted2.helpvalue: ‚ö° Quick serves webpages from any URL (including subdomains) on your domain. Simply add a Page URL to your Page Configuration.

gettingStarted23.helpvalue: ‚ö° Any images and other media in your Custom Template must be hosted remotely.

gettingStarted26.helpvalue: ‚ö° Do not include base64 encoded images in your template due to strict template size restrictions.

gettingStarted3.helpvalue: ‚ö° Page URLs must include a hostname to resolve correctly.

gettingStarted7.helpvalue: ‚ö° Custom Headers will be sent along with each page.

gettingStarted9.helpvalue: ‚ö° Pages can be reordered in the UI below for organization but this won't have any other effect on Quick.

disableQuick.description: Disable Quick without uninstalling the app.  Your Quick pages will go offline.
disableQuick.title: Disable Quick

enableOrigin.description: üåê Unhandled routes will display a default fallback page.
enableOrigin.title: Enable Origin Mode

errorTemplate.placeholder:
<!-- html template goes here -->
<!-- default template will show if empty -->
errorTemplate.title: üìù 404 Not Found Template

getOriginTemplateFree.helpvalue: ‚ö° The Pro tier unlocks custom Origin Templates.

getOriginTemplatePlus.helpvalue: ‚ö° The Pro tier unlocks custom Origin Templates.

originTemplate.description: Template to display on root domain requests.
originTemplate.placeholder:
<!-- html template goes here -->
<!-- default template will show if empty -->
originTemplate.title: üìù Origin Template

welcome0.helpvalue: Quick does just that. Read through the Cheatsheet section and add your first page for free.

welcome1.helpvalue: Do you want ‚ö° fast pages served from the edge of Cloudflare's global network?

products.title: Free
products.longDescription: A single static page with the Free tier.

products.title: Plus
products.longDescription: Up to five pages with the Plus tier.

products.title: Pro
products.longDescription: Unlimited pages and custom templates with the Pro tier.

proposedApp.title: Origin
proposedApp.shortDescription: A serverless origin for your website
proposedApp.longDescription:
Need an origin without all the overhead?  Origin is a serverless homepage without the pesky DNS or server configuration.

If you own *example.com*, Origin will show a home page for requests to *www.example.com/* and a 404 page for unmatched routes.

Origin Features:
* Configureable serverless homepage
* Configureable serverless 404 page

Read Origin's [docs](https://www.networkchimp.com/docs/origin.html) for complete information.
proposedApp.author: Network Chimp
